page.title: 02OLD PEOPLE'S HOMES
page.content:
Stallard Court. _______________ There are 21 bungalows for 28 people who have been there since it opened 18 months ago on 5/7/84. The warden is Mr.N.Johnson who can see every bungalow's kitchen window from his house. Every resident has something wrong with them. Each bungalow has 4 or 5 emergency alarm pull cords. The doctor visits at least once a month.
Cartlidge House _______________ Cartlidge House is near to Wombridge County School. It was named after the Rev. Cartlidge who had the pit mound cleared where the building now stands. It opened 10 years ago. There are 60 people there. One lady is 102 years old. Mrs. Swan is deputy warden.
